description: The festive mood turned solemn after an earthquake, a plane collision, fire and random stabbing. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Japan faces inauspicious start to new year with resilience
title_page: Japan faces inauspicious start to new year with resilience | The Straits Times
maintext:
TOKYO – Just four days into 2024, calamity (災) is already a front-runner for when Japan chooses its word of the year come December.
First, a devastating earthquake, then a fiery plane collision at Japan’s busiest airport. These were followed by an inferno that razed Japan’s oldest shopping arcade, and then a random stabbing incident on a public train.
